price: 73. Mereka (saudara-saudara Yusuf) menjawab, “Demi Allah, sungguh, kamu mengetahui bahwa kami datang bukan untuk berbuat kerusakan di negeri ini dan kami bukanlah para pencuri.”
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَٰرِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi laqad ʿalim'tum mā ji'nā linuf'sida fī al-arḍi wamā kunnā sāriqīna
